content.content: 寻血犬主动探测器最初由通讯之星开发,以猎兔犬主动探测器作为这套增强系统的技术基础,当接入通用电子传感器,装备的单位能够检测和区分除常规步兵外的其他战场单位,无论他们是伪装或关闭.

content.original: Battle Armor Mechanical Jump Boosters share the advantages and limitations of their larger cousins. They offer a very limited jump capability and they're hard to steer when in flight. However, the Mechanical Jump Boosters used on Battle Armor offers one significant advantage over their 'Mech sized cousins: They allow the armored infantry soldier to replace the normal walking gait with a longer "bouncing" gait that allows the battle armored trooper to cover more ground.
content.prevOriginal: Battle Armor Mechanical Jump Boosters share the advantages and limitations of their larger cousins. They offer a very limited jump capability and they're hard to steer when in flight. However, the Mechanical Jump Boosters used on Battle Armor offers one significant advantage over their 'Mech sized cousins: They allow the armored infantry soldier to replace the normal walking gait with a longer "bouncing" gait that allows the battle armored trooper to cover more ground.
content.content: 战斗装甲机械式跳跃推进器也有它较大表亲的优点和局限性.它们的跳跃能力非常有限,在空中很难以操纵.然而,战斗装甲上使用的机械跳跃助助推器比它们机甲尺寸的表亲有一个显著优势:他们可以让战斗装甲的士兵使用跳跃取代正常的步行状态,从而使战斗装甲士兵能够穿过更多地形.

content.original: Advanced BA armor was created by combined efforts of FWL and Blakist scientists in an attempt to more closely replicate clan Elemantal armor. While still heavier than clan version, it is noticably lighter than IS Standard armor
content.prevOriginal: Advanced BA armor was created by combined efforts of FWL and Blakist scientists in an attempt to more closely replicate clan Elemantal armor. While still heavier than clan version, it is noticably lighter than IS Standard armor
content.content: 先进的BA装甲是由FWL和布莱克斯特科学家共同努力创造的,试图更细致地复制氏族元素装甲.虽然仍然比氏族版本重,但明显比标准装甲轻

content.original: An Armored Battle Armor provides vastly Superior Protection
content.prevOriginal: An Armored Battle Armor provides vastly Superior Protection
content.content: 装甲化战斗装甲提供了极好的保护

content.original: The standard against which all battle armor is measured, the Elemental battle. A marvel of Clan engineering that allowed a small group of operators to take down large 'Mechs and survive the encounter. While it is possible for a normal-sized human to use the battle armor, this design is tailored for the Clans' giant Elemental warriors and only they can bring out its fullest potential.
content.prevOriginal: The standard against which all battle armor is measured, the Elemental battle. A marvel of Clan engineering that allowed a small group of operators to take down large 'Mechs and survive the encounter. While it is possible for a normal-sized human to use the battle armor, this design is tailored for the Clans' giant Elemental warriors and only they can bring out its fullest potential.
content.content: 元素战系统是衡量所有战斗装甲的标准.这是氏族工程上的一个奇迹,允许一群操作员击毁大型机甲并在战斗中幸存下来.虽然正常大小的人也可以使用战斗装甲,但这种设计专门为氏族巨型元素战士量身定做的,只有他们才能发挥其最大潜力.

content.original: Envirosealed unarmored exoskeleton. Clearly unsuitable for combat, but desperate times call for desperate measures, and people had attempted to swarm mechs in exoskeletons with laser cutters and industrual drills.
content.prevOriginal: Envirosealed unarmored exoskeleton. Clearly unsuitable for combat, but desperate times call for desperate measures, and people had attempted to swarm mechs in exoskeletons with laser cutters and industrual drills.
content.content: 环境密闭的无装甲外骨骼.显然不适合战斗,但绝望的时刻只有绝望的办法,人们试图用装有激光切割机和工业钻头的外骨骼涌向机甲.
+2精度,+50%严重损伤率,+30%射程,-50%所有武器最低射程.

content.original: The Inner Sphere Standard was developed following the initial thrust of the Clan invasion, as Inner Sphere powers rushed to duplicate the battle armor technology the Clans fielded. Lacking any battlefield salvage on which to base their development though, engineers were forced to work off of ancient rumors of early power armor suits like the Nighthawk, more akin to armored Exoskeletons than the 'Toads' currently rampaging through known space.
content.prevOriginal: The Inner Sphere Standard was developed following the initial thrust of the Clan invasion, as Inner Sphere powers rushed to duplicate the battle armor technology the Clans fielded. Lacking any battlefield salvage on which to base their development though, engineers were forced to work off of ancient rumors of early power armor suits like the Nighthawk, more akin to armored Exoskeletons than the 'Toads' currently rampaging through known space.
content.content: 内天体标准最初是在氏族入侵的推动下制定的,因为内天势力争相复制氏族部署的战斗装甲技术.然而,由于缺乏任何战场打捞,工程师们被迫拜托了关于早期战斗装甲(BA)套装的古老传闻,如"夜鹰",更类似于装甲外骨骼,而不是在已知空间中肆虐的"蟾蜍".

content.original: The bulkier armor of this unit is cheaper to maintain and provide added stability to help with weapon aim
content.prevOriginal: The bulkier armor of this unit is cheaper to maintain and provide added stability to help with weapon aim
content.content: 这单位笨重的装甲维护成本较低,并提供额外的稳定性以帮助武器瞄准
突破射击, 提高精度/后座

content.prevOriginal: RISC scientists tried to achieve clan level BA armor efficienty with Mimetic capabilities. The result was... mixed. While this armor does weight noticably less, it also shatters easily, damaging equipment and wounding troopers.

content.original: Fusion engines function by harnessing the power of a fusion reaction, running on light hydrogen and protium. Fusion engines are defined by their engine rating. For 'Mechs, the engine rating is the mathematical product of the mass of the vehicle and its desired maximum walking or cruising velocity.
content.prevOriginal: Fusion engines function by harnessing the power of a fusion reaction, running on light hydrogen and protium. Fusion engines are defined by their engine rating. For 'Mechs, the engine rating is the mathematical product of the mass of the vehicle and its desired maximum walking or cruising velocity.
content.content: 聚变引擎的功能是以轻氢和钚为燃料获得聚变反应的能量. 聚变引擎根据其引擎额定功率区分.对于机甲来说,引擎额定功率是其重量和最大步行或巡航速度的数学乘积.

content.original: his is a rare weapon indeed, a Pop-Up Mine designed for mounting on the Sloth Battle Armor suit. The first quad battle armor, the Sloth was designed to carry this mine into combat and deploy it while directly beneath the target mech. The mine would then pop up and penetrate the armor from below, dealing direct structure damage. The BA-scale Pop-Up Mine was only ever deployed on the Sloth and fell out of favor along with the Sloth as technology advanced and suits became more complex. Battle Armor Weapons can only be mounted on Powered Armor Units.

content.content: 他的武器确实很罕见,是一个弹出式地雷,设计用于安装在'树懒'战斗装甲服上,作为第一个四足战斗装甲,'树懒'被设计用来携带这种地雷进入战斗,并在目标机甲的正下方部署它.然后地雷会弹出,从下面穿透装甲,造成直接的结构伤害.BA级弹出式地雷只在'树懒'上部署过,随着技术的进步和过于复杂的套件结构,它与'树懒'一起失宠了. 战斗装甲专用武器,只能被战斗装甲(BA)单位安装
